net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.input.mouse

Class Mouse

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.input.mouse.Mouse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class Mouse
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener
    A class which encapsulates the MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, and MouseWheelListener interfaces and enables more game-friendly functionality.
    Since:
    March 6, 2015, 2:44:04 PM
    Author:
    Christian Bryce Alexander

        Returns:

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • getDeltaX

        public int getDeltaX()
        Returns:
        The per-pixel change in the x coordinate of the mouse relative to the associated Viewable

      • getDeltaY

        public int getDeltaY()
        Returns:
        The per-pixel change in the y coordinate of the mouse relative to the associated Viewable

      • isWithinView

        public boolean isWithinView()
        Returns:

        Returns:

      • isDragging

        public boolean isDragging()
        Returns:

        Returns:

      • getWheelRotation

        public int getWheelRotation()
        Returns:
        The amount of clicks the mouse wheel has moved since the last update
